body_html: Could you try with GCC 6.2.1? According to http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-installation-guide-linux/index.html#system-requirements 6.2.1 is the latest version tested with Fedora 25, so it might be worth trying out.

body: Could you try with GCC 6.2.1? According to http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-installation-guide-linux/index.html#system-requirements 6.2.1 is the latest version tested with Fedora 25, so it might be worth trying out.
